text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus fuscosquamulosus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description: The cap is 3 to 7 centimetres (1.2 to 2.8 in) in diameter.
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus fuscosquamulosus grows on the roots of buckeye and rhododendron. In North America, it has been collected from North Carolina, in June.
